name: LudumDare52 - Harvest Construct Produce Destroy
description:
Yet again a Strategy Game made during Ludum Dare 52 (extra).

HCPD is played using the mouse and a couple of keys - best play the Tutorial, it explains the basics of the game and you can toy around there.

There are 5 Missions, each of them varies in mission tasks and or situation for the Player.

btw. click on the solo control button to change the game to shared control, and you can kill selected units by pressing delete (that works for enemies in shared control mode, too)

GL&HF
